page.title: 13FARMING OR CROFTING S.HARRIS
page.content:
{WEST SIDE OF HARRIS}_ As the land on the {WEST SIDE} is more fertile and less rocky{TRACTORS } are used to turn the ground.The same crops are grown as on the east side. Due to the fertile land more sheep and cattle are reared.{ { {VILLAGE CROFTS CATTLE SHEEP HENS GOATS Finsbay 7 3 400 8 1 Rodel 10 4 900 23 1 Leverburgh 20 40 900 27 19 Strond 8 4 900 13 2 Northon 41 46 1194 142 3
{FISHING}_There are 3 fishing vessels in the area,Valiant,Sulaire and Misty Isle.They fish for lobsters,prawns, velvet crab,clams & herring which are sold at the market.Fish farming has been introduced recently i.e mussel farming & salmon hatcheries.
